read_pfm[source]

read_pfm(path)

Read pfm file.

Args: path (str): path to file

Returns: tuple: (data, scale)

{% endraw %} {% raw %}
{% endraw %} {% raw %}

write_pfm[source]

write_pfm(path, image, scale=1)

Write pfm file.

Args: path (str): pathto file image (array): data scale (int, optional): Scale. Defaults to 1.

{% endraw %} {% raw %}
{% endraw %} {% raw %}

read_image[source]

read_image(path)

Read image and output RGB image (0-1).

Args: path (str): path to file

Returns: array: RGB image (0-1)

{% endraw %} {% raw %}
{% endraw %} {% raw %}

resize_image[source]

resize_image(img)

Resize image and make it fit for network.

Args: img (array): image

Returns: tensor: data ready for network

{% endraw %} {% raw %}
{% endraw %} {% raw %}

resize_depth[source]

resize_depth(depth, width, height)

Resize depth map and bring to CPU (numpy).

Args: depth (tensor): depth width (int): image width height (int): image height

Returns: array: processed depth

{% endraw %} {% raw %}
{% endraw %} {% raw %}

write_depth[source]

write_depth(path, depth, bits=1)

Write depth map to pfm and png file.

Args: path (str): filepath without extension depth (array): depth
